abstract_ssm: The collection contains one photograph album of Brooklyn buildings and an accompanying map, one booklet on the founding of the Emil Bommer Playground, located at 423 DeKalb Ave. in Brooklyn; one booklet celebrating the 75th anniversary of the Bommer Spring Hinge Co. of Brooklyn; and one news clipping concerning Bommer Spring Hinge Co.'s move to Landrum, S.C. in the 1960s. Some genealogical information can be found in the Bommer playground booklet.
